title.zh: 中国台湾四家鸡尾酒吧带来客座

location.en: JING Bar, The Temple House, Jinjiang District
location.zh: JING Bar, 成都博舍酒店, 锦江区

description.en:
This week, we've invited four bartenders from Taiwan for a limited-time guest shift, bringing two nights of diverse and creative cocktail experiences.

Featuring renowned bars like unDer lab, which has been selected for the 50 Best Discovery list, as well as creations by bartender Seven, whose establishments have consistently ranked on Asia's & World's 50 Best Bars lists for multiple years. These four distinctive bars come together at JING Bar, infusing Chengdu nights with inspiration and sophistication.
description.zh:
本周，我们邀来来自中国台湾的四位调酒师限时客座，带来两晚风格各异、创意十足的调酒体验。

有入选 50 Best Discovery 的知名酒吧 unDer lab，也有由调酒师 Seven 主理、连续多年登上亚洲 & 世界五十大酒吧榜单的作品。四家风格出众的酒吧齐聚井酒吧，为成都夜晚注入灵感与层次。

title.en: Guest Shift by Guangzhou's champion bartender couple in Papuwa
title.zh: 广州冠军夫妻档调酒师接管Papuwa!

description.en: Papuwa Chengdu proudly presents Guest Shift Night, featuring award-winning mixologists from Guangzhou! Join us as champion bartenders 44 from CANTINA AAH and Kaka from IBARUS take over our bar for one special evening. This talented duo will showcase their signature cocktails, blending innovative techniques with a creative mix of ingredients including chili, seafood, grilled elements, exotic spices, and fresh fruits and herbs. Experience their unique personal styles and award-winning creations on April 12, 2025, from 9:00 PM to midnight at our Jinjiang District location. Don't miss this extraordinary cocktail journey!
description.zh: 成都Papuwa隆重呈现客座调酒师之夜，特邀广州顶尖调酒大师驾临！广州CANTINA AAH的44和广州IBARUS的卡卡，这对荣获多项全国及地区冠军的夫妻调酒师将为您呈现独具匠心的鸡尾酒体验。他们将运用辣椒、海鲜、炙烤元素、香料以及新鲜果蔬，创造出极具个人特色的独特调酒作品。2025年4月12日晚9点至午夜，锦江区东顺城南路的Papuwa期待您的光临，共享这场非凡的味蕾盛宴！

description.en: We are honored to welcome Crawford So, the mastermind behind Paal and Gallows Humor, who will craft an intoxicating early spring dreamscape. Paal is known for its minimalist design and innovative cocktail philosophy, while Gallows Humor is famous for its dark humor style and bold cocktail explorations. This is an excellent opportunity to experience two distinctly different beverage systems while exploring the boundless spirit of freedom.
description.zh: 这次我们很荣幸邀请到 Paal 和 Gallows Humor 的主理人 Crawford So，他将在春季为我们编织一场初春的微醺梦境。Paal 以其简约主义设计和创新调酒理念著称，而 Gallows Humor 则以其黑暗幽默风格和大胆的鸡尾酒探索闻名。这是一次体验两种截然不同饮品体系的绝佳机会，让我们共同探索无边界的自由精神。

title.zh: 连续四年世界50佳酒吧第一名主理人Simone Caporale接管Papuwa

description.en: SIP invited Simone Caporale, who has been ranked as one of the World's 50 Best Bars for four consecutive years (2012-2015), to come to Chengdu to share his 'Cuban Wisdom' cocktail concept.
description.zh: SIP特邀连续四年(2012-2015年)蝉联世界50佳酒吧排名第一的主理人Simone Caporale 空降成都 分享深蕴"古巴智慧"的鸡尾酒理念
